text: Burzum was a black metal/dark ambient one man band from Bergen, Norway. The band was formed in 1991 by Varg Vikernes. The word "Burzum" means "darkness" in the Black Speech, a fictional language created by J. R. R. Tolkien for The Lord of the Rings novels. == Discography == === Albums === * Burzum (1992) * Det som engang var (1993) * Hvis lyset tar oss (1994) * Filosofem (1996) * Dauði Baldrs (1997) * Hliðskjálf (1999) * Belus (2010) * Fallen (2011) * Umskiptar (2012) * Sôl austan, Mâni vestan (2013) * The Ways of Yore (2014) * Thulêan Mysteries (2020) === EPs === * Aske (1993) == Other websites == * Burzum ==References== Category:Black metal bands Category:Thrash metal bands Category:Norwegian heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups from Bergen Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:1991 establishments in Europe Category:1990s establishments in Norway Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1999 Category:1999 disestablishments in Europe Category:Musical groups established in 2009 Category:2009 establishments in Europe Category:21st-century establishments in Norway
